description: Schema for optional activity extension data within a plyzen ingest event message.

changeRequest.description: (optional) References a change request associated with the activity, typically a deployment.

id.description: Change request ID, e.g. ticket number.

type.description: (optional) Identifies the system managing the change request, e.g. 'jira'. Used to derive a link to the change request if configured in plyzen.
